prodNameC: 邦迪斯抗嗜中性球細胞質抗體試劑/受質玻片
prodNameE: THE BINDING SITE ANCA KIT/SUBSTRATE SLIDES
ingredientsDesc:
1. Ethanol and formalin-fixed neutrophil sustrate slides (5 or 10 well).
2. Positive control sera (eg. p-ANCA, c-ANCA, ANA) containing 0.099% sodium azide.
3. Negative control serum containing 0.099% sodium azide.
4. Affinity purified sheep anti-human IgG (H+L) fluorescein isothiocyanate (FITC) containing 0.099% sodium azide.
5. 1% Evans Blue, as an optional counterstain.
6. Phosphate buffered saline (PBS), a 20-fold concentrate in liquid form.
7. Blotters to blot around the wells after washing.
8. Mounting medium, containing an anti-fading agent (DABCO, 1, 4, diazabicyclo-2.2.2-octane).
9. Coverslips (22 x 70 mm).
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 半定量檢測抗嗜性球細胞質抗體，此抗體可作為Wegen's和血管炎的診治依據。
